item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/T Arm Switch (A/T ARM)

remarks.para: May be inoperative OFF provided autothrottle systems are considered inoperative.

numlitem.para: If A/T ARM Switch is in the OFF position, the EEC engine trim function will not operate. Small thrust asymmetry may occur even if the throttles appear aligned.
EICAS display of Thrust Management computations are operative.

placard.para: Placard A/T ARM Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
